result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on December 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Letter from Attorney Knepel to MRR.

2:28 PM Defendant Martin J. Posvic not in court.  Attorney Nathan J. Heim in court for Martin J. Posvic.  Prosecuting attorney Gail Ann Prost in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
The defendant fails to appear for today's initial appearance. State requests a warrant.
The Court authorizes a warrant for the defendant.

ADDRESS INFO for Martin J. Posvic

Prior: C/O ABridge Care Cottage of Kewaunee, 1000, Kewaunee, WI 54216 United States

ADDRESS INFO for Martin J. Posvic
Current: 1000 Baumeister Dr, Kewaunee, WI 54216 United States  (Effective: 10-21-2022)
Prior: 444 Pleasant Lane #11, Whitelaw, WI 54247

Defendant Martin J. Posvic not in court.  Attorney Heather M Faeh in court for Martin J. Posvic.  Attorney Jordan W. Feest in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant has other matters pending and there may have been some confusion re today's date.  Attorney Knepel will reach out to him.
IA reset to 10-31-2022 at 1:30pm

Defendant may be in a facility.   Initial appearance is reset to 10-10-22 at 1:30 p.m.  
Minutes.
Notice of Hearing returned as undeliverable. Forwarding address provided. Remailed on 9-16-2022.

NOT ON THE RECORD - Defendant Martin J. Posvic not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Patrick Knorr, the defendant's guardian (from Corporate Guardians) appears by zoom.  He advises the court that the defendant has been transferred to a treatment facility and will be able to appear by zoom at the next appearance.  Initial appearance is reset to 09-26-22 at 1:30 p.m.  Mr. Knorr will work with defendant's social worker to set up the zoom appearance.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Re:  Victim 1, on 07-23-22.   
Initial appearance is set for 09-12-22 at 1:30 p.m.
Court sets bail at $1500.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant is to have no contact with J.S. and not to possess any firearms.
